Label: Purpose
Identifier: To provide a general purpose field for identifiers

Label: Entry Guidelines
Identifier: This may include a DOI, catalog number, and/or other system number.

Label: Commentary
Identifier: This is a general purpose field that can contain one or more persistent identifers or permalinks. At least one value would be ideally a persistent identifier or permalink (such as a PURL or Handle. Additional values can be for other identifiers used by the resource, such as the call number, OCLC number, or other system identifier. This field is not displayed in the interface.
